Interface Vec2d<T extends Vec2d<T>>

    Vec<T>, Vecd<T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SGVec_2d

    public interface Vec2d<T extends Vec2d<T>>
extends Vecd<T>

      • adoptValuesOf

        default void adoptValuesOf(Vec2d v)
        should cause this Vector to adopt the xyz values of the input vector. This method has a default implementation that simply calls setX_(), setY_() but you should override it if your vector implementation requires more than that.
        Parameters:
        v -

      • adoptValuesOf

        default void adoptValuesOf(Vec3f v)
        should cause this Vector to adopt the xyz values of the input vector. This method has a default implementation that simply calls setX_(), setY_() but you should override it if your vector implementation requires more than that.
        Parameters:
        v -
